112.content:
MACHROLANDIA is a beautiful fantasy world full of magic, adventure and a plethora of differently sized races, that all for some reason consist of only futas(or dickgirls). Some species are basically walking mountains, others are so small that they are barely visible by the naked eye. The smaller races have magical powers, that can give them the edge over the sheer strength and brute force of the larger races. The different species of this world are divided into several different size tiers, here they are, from smallest to largest.


Z Tier - below 2 mm
The Z Tier represents the smallest sentient races in existence. They rarely live longer than 1 year largely due to the fact that they are unnoticeable to all other races.They are commonly referred to as "Nanoes" by the people who believe they exist.

F Tier - 2 mm to 2 cm
These species are still very, very small, but big enough so that the other races are able to see them and maybe consider them, which is for better or worse. They are commonly referred to as "Microes".

E Tier - 2 cm to 10 cm
These are considered to be the "average" small races. Mostly because they're just big enough to be useful to humans. They are commonly referred to as "Tinies".

D Tier - around 1.8 m
This is where the human race belongs. Races of this size tier are considered the average. They usually posses the strongest magic powers. They have no commonly used name.

C Tier - 2 m to 4 m
Just slightly above average, this size tier still has some magic powers, but still not as much as D Tier. Their size allows them to coexist with average size races. They are commonly referred to as "Amazons".

B Tier - 4 m to 10 m
The species belonging to B Tier and all tears above posses no magical powers. They mostly live in their own villages, but some choose to protect or rule over amazon and normal people's villages. They are commonly referred to as "Mini-Giantesses".

A Tier - 10 m to 100 m
The members of this size tier rarely form villages or communities, as they prefer to lead a nomadic and isolated lifestyle. They are commonly referred to as "Giantesses".

S Tier - 100 m to 1 km
These races are fully aware of the smaller races, and they often use their superior size and strength to enforce their will. They are commonly referred to as "Mega-Giantesses".

SS Tier - 1 km and above
These creatures are feared and avoided by all other races. They are so unbelievably massive that their mere footsteps cause catastrophic earthquakes. not only that but they are completely oblivious to all other small races, and they unknowingly end hundreds of lives each day. They are commonly referred to as "Titans".

Since you chose to be inferior you will have to choose between Z, F, E or D Tier.

1243321111.content:
You saw two towering figures making their way towards you. They were both built like brick walls and they were covered in war paints, they didn't wear anything and were showing off their monstrous cocks. They had green skin and small tusks protruding from their mouths, it was obvious that they were orcs from the Greenfist tribe. CRAP! you thought to yourself, what were these green brutes doing in your swamp? Luckily they haven't noticed you yet. You lay down motionlessly in the mud hoping they just pass by, when the smaller orc woman interrupted the eerie silence and said: "Why are we even here Urga? This place gives the the creeps!". To which the larger one replied "Relax Klara don't tell me you can't handle a few gators!". "It's not the animals i'm afraid of, it's the swamp people!" Klara replied. "Oh god you believe in that stupid myth don't you? Look there's no such thing as swamp people, those are just legend that the elders tells us so that we don't venture too far away". Klara then sighted in relief and said "I'll trust you on this one Urga, but still why are we here?". "Well look our Warchief said that if no one is using these lands for anything we might as well take them for ourselves. So she send us both to scout ahead for anything worthwhile" said Urga. Klara simply nodded in agreement and they both kept on marching through the mud.

125.content:
MACHROLANDIA is a beautiful fantasy world full of magic, adventure and a plethora of differently sized races, that all for some reason consist of only futas(or dickgirls). Some species are basically walking mountains, others are so small that they are barely visible by the naked eye. The smaller races have magical powers, that can give them the edge over the sheer strength and brute force of the larger races. The different species of this world are divided into several different size tiers, here they are, from smallest to largest.


Z Tier - below 2 mm
The Z Tier represents the smallest sentient races in existence. They rarely live longer than 1 year largely due to the fact that they are unnoticeable to all other races.They are commonly referred to as "Nanoes" by the people who believe they exist.

F Tier - 2 mm to 2 cm
These species are still very, very small, but big enough so that the other races are able to see them and maybe consider them, which is for better or worse. They are commonly referred to as "Microes".

E Tier - 2 cm to 10 cm
These are considered to be the "average" small races. Mostly because they're just big enough to be useful to humans. They are commonly referred to as "Tinies".

D Tier - around 1.8 m
This is where the human race belongs. Races of this size tier are considered the average. They usually posses the strongest magic powers. They have no commonly used name.

C Tier - 2 m to 4 m
Just slightly above average, this size tier still has some magic powers, but still not as much as D Tier. Their size allows them to coexist with average size races. They are commonly referred to as "Amazons".

B Tier - 4 m to 10 m
The species belonging to B Tier and all tears above posses no magical powers. They mostly live in their own villages, but some choose to protect or rule over amazon and normal people's villages. They are commonly referred to as "Mini-Giantesses".

A Tier - 10 m to 100 m
The members of this size tier rarely form villages or communities, as they prefer to lead a nomadic and isolated lifestyle. They are commonly referred to as "Giantesses".

S Tier - 100 m to 1 km
These races are fully aware of the smaller races, and they often use their superior size and strength to enforce their will. They are commonly referred to as "Mega-Giantesses".

SS Tier - 1 km and above
These creatures are feared and avoided by all other races. They are so unbelievably massive that their mere footsteps cause catastrophic earthquakes. not only that but they are completely oblivious to all other small races, and they unknowingly end hundreds of lives each day. They are commonly referred to as "Titans".

Since you chose to be a giantess you will have to choose between C, B, A, S or SS Tier
125.title: your choice

Obsidian Giantess

Size: 600 Meters to 800 Metres
Appearance: Colossal, Gray, Futa Giantesses.
Habitat: Mountains, Caves, Canyons, anywhere that has plenty of rocks/stones and is far away from civilization.
Info:Obsidian Giantesses are one of the largest land races on Machrolandia Many call them "walking-mountains." Despite being titanic in size they're extremely docile and shy and try to avoid civilization as much as possible for fear of hurting anyone. They aren't carnivorous and only diet off of rocks. In general really don't pose a threat to anyone, except during mating season. The smaller races refer to the Obsidian Giantess mating season as the Earthquake season. Even though they live far away from civilization, their size combined with their intense intercourse, causes great tremors in the neighboring kingdoms. NEVER insult and Obsidian Giantess, when you push these gentle giants too far they won't hesitate to remind you who the bigger is. Other than that they're down to earth and don't want to have to deal with the drama of civilization and predator VS prey. They'd rather chill on their mountain tops, snack on some rocks, and enjoy the view.
Powers: They have tough grey skin and are highly resilient to pain. They all are naturally strong, even for their size.
125312.title: Colossal Obsidian Giantess
